Name: docc2json
Tagline: Turn Apple DocC output into a web-friendly SDK JSON schema
Description: Apple DocC is great inside Xcode, but hard to reuse elsewhere. docc2json parses DocC JSON output and converts it into a clean, structured SDK schema optimized for web documentation sites, IDE tooling, and analysis.

Name: Rest Now - Screen Break Timer
Tagline: Lightweight screen break timer for macOS
Topics: Health & Fitness, Productivity, Menu Bar Apps
Description: Rest Now is a lightweight screen break timer for macOS that helps reduce eye strain and mental fatigue during long screen sessions. Designed for macOS users who spend long hours coding, designing, studying, or working on a macbook. Key Features: Menu bar screen break timer, eye-friendly break reminders, minimal and distraction-free design, quietly runs in the background while you work. Rest your eyes. Reset your focus. Rest Now.

Name: 8udget

Description: 8udget is a personal finance app that actually works offline - no internet required. Track your budget with category breakdowns, monitor stock & crypto investments in real-time, manage recurring bills with reminders, and set financial goals with progress tracking. Unlike other finance apps, your data stays on your device by default. Import messy bank statements with 80-90% accuracy. Available on iOS, Android, Web, Mac - all from one codebase built with Flutter + Rust. Free to start.

Name: Still

Unlike traditional journaling apps, Still doesn't track streaks, moods, or goals. It gives you a private, calm space to write freely â€” for clarity, not performance. No accounts. No social features. No prompts telling you how to feel. Just you, your thoughts, and a moment of stillness.

Name: CalendarJet
Tagline: AI scheduling with branded booking page your own domain

Normally $497. Zero branding. Your logo only. Full customization like WeTransfer. AI that schedules by voice. Built for coaches, agencies, and founders tired of the subscription trap.

Name: Fluxer

Name: Mnexium AI

Name: Tempo

Description: Tempo tracks listening across 20+ Android music apps (Spotify, YouTube Music, local files) and unifies it into one timeline. Get "Wrapped-style" insights in real-time for any rangeâ€”today, week, month, all timeâ€”plus cinematic story cards built for sharing. Deep stats include discovery dates, fan badges, engagement scores, moods, and listening personalities.

Name: Notchification
Tagline: Compilation and Claude progress bars in your mac's notch!

Name: FrickFrack
Tagline: a minimalist social media experience
Topics: Android, Social Media, Video Art, Video
Description: In a world of 4K perfection, FrickFrack celebrates the beauty of limitation. Every video you create is automatically transformed into a retro GameBoy-style masterpiece: 256x256 pixels, a nostalgic 4-color green palette, and that unmistakable lo-fi aesthetic that defined a generation. "Constraint Breeds Creativity." By limiting resolution, color, and duration, FrickFrack forces you to think differently. Every frame matters. Every movement counts. Ready to create something beautifully imperfect?
